Most Illustrious Sir

The citizen Antônio José de Abreu says that he was appointed and sworn in by Your Excellency José Augusto Eledek José Augusto Ledek, and because, in accordance with paragraph 1 of article 90 of the order of Book 1 and the deliberation of May 9, 1834, it is incumbent upon the Petitioner to receive and administer the assets of the inheritance, [...].

He requests of Your Excellency

I wish to receive Your Mercy

The Petitioner is relieved from the guardianship he signed, in view of my order of today, recorded in the respective records. Piratini, October 1, 1841. Freitas [no. 2 — Attached to document CV-29.]
